publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1081 Brian Adam: Dons Eat Danishâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Aberdeen Football Club on its success after its defeat of FC Copenhagen to make it three Scottish clubs still in European competition after Christmas; wishes all the Scottish clubs well in European competitions in the new year; wishes the national side well in the World Cup qualifiers in 2008; notes that this is the first time that three Scottish clubs have been in such a position in decades, and further notes the strong position of Scottish football as a whole, with Scotland in 14th place in the FIFA world rankings.

S3M-1081 Dons Eat Danish (lodged on 21 December 2007) Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Lewis Macdonald*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bill Kidd*, David Stewart*, Sandra White*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Butler*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-1081 Dons Eat Danish (lodged on 21 December 2007) Gil Paterson*
S3M-1081 Dons Eat Danish (lodged on 21 December 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1081 Dons Eat Danish (lodged on 21 December 2007) Nigel Don*
